text: Hans-Ulrich Klose (14 June 1937 - 6 September 2023) was a German politician from the Social Democratic Party. Klose was the First Mayor (German: Erster Bürgermeister) of the Free and Hanseatic City of Hamburg from 1974 up to 1981 and was President of the Bundesrat in 1979/80.Biography Klose died on 6 September 2023, after suffering from Alzheimer's disease in Hamburg at the age of 86.Hamburgs ehemaliger Bürgermeister Klose gestorben ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * German Parliament site * Personal data sheet Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Germany) Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease
title: Hans-Ulrich Klose
